Articles.Content: What is the KE-WAITNONOSTOP-01 Kerbal Unreconstitutionator? What is it, and what is it's function? The part descript tells me nothing
Basically, it lets you sacrifice a kerbal and get some resources...
Personally I up the yield in the config file to like a billion, and then only use it in Sandbox mode to test stuff. Then one (imaginary) Kerbal fills up all the Kethane tanks on the rig.

Kerbals contain kethane. The unreconstitutionator is essentially a blender that kills a kerbal to produce some Kethane. You can use it when you're in a really desperate situation or to test things at the launchpad.

To use it you EVA the ill fated Kerbal close and right click the part. Select the appropriate option and watch in horror.

No kidding ?!, I know it's a mod part and all but, it sounds so un-KSPish, more like something out of Duke Nukem or the like. Oh well, at least the name makes more sense to me now. Thanks for the answers all though now I'm kind of regretting I asked!
